content: materials hat - 1 1 1 1 2 skein s of purl soho s super soft merino 1 100% merino wool each skein is approximately 87 yards/ 100 grams approximately 45 55 65 85 105 total yards required we used the colors heirloom white super pink pale verdigris and sapphire blue - us 11 8 mm 16-inch circular needles 2 for adult sizes - a set of us 11 double pointed needles 3 for all sizes - stitch markers 4 including one unique mittens - 1 1 2 2 skein s of purl soho s super soft merino 5 100% merino wool each skein is approximately 87 yards/ 100 grams approximately 55 70 100 140 total yards required we used the color berry blue - a set of us 11 double pointed needles 6 - stitch markers 7 including one unique - scrap yarn hand warmers - 1 1 1 2 skein s of purl soho s super soft merino 8 100% merino wool each skein is approximately 87 yards/ 100 grams approximately 50 60 87 120 total yards required we used the color peachy pink - a set of us 11 double pointed needles 9 - stitch markers 10 including one unique - stitch holder 11 or scrap yarn gauge 12 stitches and 17 rounds = 4 inches in stockinette stitch sizes hat baby toddler kid adult small/medium adult medium/large - finished circumference 13¼ 14¾ 17¼ 18¾ 21¼ inches - finished height 7 8 9 9¾ 10¾ inches with instructions to modify samples the heirloom white hat is the baby size super pink is the toddler size pale verdigris is the kid size and sapphire blue is the adult small/medium mittens + hand warmers toddler kid adult small/medium adult medium/large - finished palm circumference 4¾ 6 7¼ 8¾ inches - hand warmers finished length 6¾ 7¾ 10 11¾ inches with instructions to modify - mittens finished length 8½ 9½ 12½ 14¾ inches with instructions to modify samples we knit the adult small/medium for both designed for purl soho by lili tobias 12 lili spends most of her time knitting listening to music or doing both at the same time she also happens to be our wonderful customer service coordinator all images ©️ copyright purl soho 1 https //www purlsoho com/super-soft-merino html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23799 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=964 5 https //www purlsoho com/super-soft-merino html 6 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23799 7 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=964 8 https //www purlsoho com/super-soft-merino html 9 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23799 10 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=964 11 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23859 12 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/lili-tobias-for-purl-soho/
